revised_title: Asymptotic Solutions of Linear Differential Equations of the Second Order
tldr: The author investigates the asymptotic solutions of linear differential equations of the second order with a single transition point. They develop a method to derive asymptotic solutions by comparing the equation with a similar one and satisfying it formally using a series with coefficients independent of the parameter. The results can be applied to hypergeometric and confluent hypergeometric equations, and help in determining new asymptotic expansions of Legendre, Laguerre, and Coulomb-wave functions of large orders.
